players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Bob: "Such a tragedy to lose someone so soon. We need to be careful with our suspicions and make sure we don't rush to conclusions. Does anyone have any information to share?"
Diana: "I agree with Bob. Let's not jump to conclusions and instead focus on gathering more information before making any decisions."
Bob: "Charlie was a quiet but valuable member of our town. I hope that if anyone has any information, they will come forward. We must consider all possibilities, including those who remain silent."

You: "I'd like to remind everyone that we have a murderer in our midst. It is important that we remain vigilant and share any information we may have, no matter how small it may seem. Let us work together to ensure the safety of our town."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
